title: Dacor Cooktop DYCT365GSNG Tour
description:
Here we take a look at the Dacor 36in natural gas cooktop DYCT365GSNG.  For more information or to make a purchase be sure to check it out at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/101729/Dacor-Discovery-36-Stainless-Steel-Gas-Cooktop-DYCT365GSNG.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=DYCT365GSNG_20170125&utm_medium=video 

Features:
- PermaClean™ Bead Blasted Finish: Makes a Dacor cooktop scratch resistant as well as mess resistant. So go ahead and get a little melted Gruyère on it. Your cooktop won't mind and, more importantly, neither will you. (Gas)
- Illumina™ Burner Controls glow Dacor's signature flame-blue™ to always let you know when a burner is on
- SimmerSear™ Burners provide up to 18,000 BTUs and achieve ultra-low temperatures for simmering and melting without any scorching
- Continuous Platform Grates are porcelain coated and allow extra large pots and pans to be moved effortlessly from burner to burner.
- Perma-Flame™ Technology automatically re-ignites a flame for continuous heating and uninterrupted cooking should a burner unexpectedly go out
- Exclusive SmartFlame™ Technology reduces flame contact with grate to prevent grate discoloration and increase longevity
- Die Cast Knobs for durability, comfort and style
- Downdraft Compatible
- Star-K Certified
- American Made: Designed and Manufactured in California, USA
- 1 SimmerSear™ Burner (750-18,000 BTU)
- 1 SimmerSear™ Burner (650-12,500 BTU)
- 1 Dual-Stacked Sealed Burner (12,500 BTU)
- 2 Dual-Stacked Sealed Burners (9,500 BTU)
